title: Host Agreement
subtitle: Review and accept the terms and policies required to host on our platform
allRequiredCompleted: All required agreements have been accepted. You can proceed to the next step.
requiredRemaining: Please accept the required terms and privacy policy to continue.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: The legal agreement governing your use of our platform as a host
terms.helpText: The Terms of Service outline your rights and responsibilities as a host on our platform.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information
privacy.helpText: Our Privacy Policy explains how we handle your personal data and protect your privacy.

guarantee.title: Host Guarantee
guarantee.subtitle: Optional protection program for property damage and liability
guarantee.helpText: The Host Guarantee provides additional protection for your property and liability coverage.
guarantee.optionalNote: This is optional but recommended for additional protection.

legalNoticeText: By accepting these agreements, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms. These agreements may be updated from time to time, and continued use of our platform constitutes acceptance of any changes.
cannotOpenDocument: Cannot open document. Please try again later.
documentError: Error opening document. Please check your internet connection.
